name: boss is you
description:
fight your way through a dungeon filled with enemies and darkness, find the ladder and beat your boss. now do it again, but quicker.

UPDATE(lag issues): if you do not have a decent pc, please download the lite version. the lighting system is very hard to run. 

sorry for the inconvenience :(

how to play(PLEASE READ):

*this is a time based score system*

- forgot to indicate how to use the dash ability - double tap any one of the movement keys (WASD) to dash in that direction.

- the rest of the controls are displayed in the starting room as well as the guns you can  choose from.

- test out the weapons against the dummies and choose your favorite one.

- enter the dungeon door and your run will begin.

- to clear the dungeon you must collect a minimum of 500 coins.

- every dungeon that generates has a ladder which you must find, this ladder leads to the boss room.

- once you spawn in the boss room the boss battle will begin.

- kill the boss to complete your run.

-your high score will be displayed on the menu screen
